ComicInfo.Summary:
Julie and Dillon travel to the frozen wilderness of Alaska to find a HeNRI facility that is manufacturing the atomic alloy stuck to Julie. But, they are not alone. Somebody else wants the powerful metal Julie is wearing... and the only way to get it is to kill her!
Ivy reports back to Dr Foster at HENRI and tells him what she knows, so much more than he gave her to start with, but with more background she renews her search.
Dillon calls Dan and tells him that the bikers are dead, he decides its time to get even.
Ivy calls Julie and tells her she just wants to get them to safety while she sits next to Pam. Ivy tells her she has no intentions of hurting Pam but if she found her then others will once this becomes a bigger incident.
Dillon spots Cain walking up the road and as they try to drive away he attacks.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:41:18. [CVDB153312]
ComicInfo.Characters: Cain, Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin, Pamela Mitchell
